name: Rage Room
description: Welcome to Rage Room. Leave your day behind, let loose and release your rage, every last bit of it. With over 50 weapons to fuel your fury our test dummies won’t know what hit them, or at least until they gain sentience. Then it’s time to battle for your life as the dummies hit back in their faceless uprising!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or better Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-6700 or better Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 or Better Storage: 6 GB available space
